overview: In her Wicked Pictures debut, Lupe Fuentes explodes on the screen in award winning director Brad Armstrong's Lolita. A visually stunning exploration of Lupes sensual side that exposes her deepest desires. Blow jobs, three-way, girl/girl, solo, its all here. The exotic beauty is joined by adults sexiest little hotties. So if like them sweet and petite Lolita is a must see. Sit back and enjoy while Lupe and friends prove that good things really do cum in small packages.
title: Lolita
